question: 2008, 2009, 2010 chit saⁿ lia̍t ê choân-pō͘ ch operating expenses, bô-lū-bînn ê kak-chè, sī sím-me?
Nai-kuan ê bu̍t-thiam-su tùi 2008 kàu 2009, hō͘-sǹg ê cheng-tōa ê pí-lu̍t sī siáⁿ chi̍t khoán?
Tī ‘total revenues net of interest expense’ siōng-koân ê nî-tāi, hit nî ê ‘net ( loss )’ sī siáⁿ-mih?
Tui 2008 chì 2010, 'hui-seng sêng-chhit' ê chìn-sêng sī án-choán? (Tui 2008 chì 2010, 'hui-seng sêng-chhit' ê chìn-sêng sī án-choán?)
answer: Tī nn̄g-ê nî ê sî-kan, 'hui-seng sêng-chhit' sī ū chi̍t ê cheng-chhat kah tōa ê hā-chhiúⁿ chìn-sêng. I tùi 2008 nî ê $6,362 pah-bān khai-sí, kiám kah 25% hō͘-chò $4,770 pah-bān tī 2009 nî, liáu-āu chiūⁿ chin hiah-tōa ê hā-chhiúⁿ 58% hō͘-chò $1,995 pah-bān tī 2010 nî.

question: Koa-koa ê gî-hōe hāng-bo̍k ê sún-sit tō-sī hùi-hōe ê kīn-tāi hôe koh-chài 2010 nî kap 2009 nî phēng-kàu bē suài hōan-tâi ê sò͘-jī?
answer: provisions for credit losses and for benefits and claims
( loss ) from continuing operations before taxes

question: 2010 nî 'total operating expenses' hō͘ 'total revenues net of interest expense' ê pí-tùi sī siáⁿ-chē? Chioh chòe-chē hō͘ liáu liáu 2 kho͘ siâu-siông lâi piáu-sù.

Nāi kong 'credit reserve build ( release )' tī 2010 chiâⁿ-chòe chi̍t ê kiàn-siat 1000 pah-bān Bí-kim, chiâⁿ-chòe pâi-siat 1771 pah-bān Bí-kim, hit nî ê sin ê 'provisions for credit losses and for benefits and claims' ē chiâⁿ-chòe siáⁿ-chái?
Tiong-iong ê "sîng-pêng sêng-chit" ê liân-sò͘-liōng hām "chháh-lī siu-ji̍p" ê liân-sò͘-liōng chi-kan ū chi̍t-ê kò͘-tēng ê koan-hē bô?
answer: Bô, bô chi̍t-ê kò͘-tēng ê koan-hē. Tùi 2008 kàu 2009, sîng-pêng sêng-chit kiám-chhiat liáu 16%, hām chháh-lī siu-ji̍p mā kiám-chhiat liáu 24%. Chiah-ê thong-kò͘ chhut-lâi chi̍t-ê khó-lêng ê tò-bé chha-piat. Kò-sî, tùi 2009 kàu 2010, sîng-pêng sêng-chit koh kiám-chhiat liáu 8%, put-kò chi̍t-ê sî chháh-lī siu-ji̍p tit-kàu liáu 6% ê cheng-tióng, phah-phòaⁿ liáu chiân-chi̍t-ê hong-sek.

question: 2010 koh 2009 nî ê piàn-tōa tsiap-sòo, ū hō-tsúi-sû, m̄-sī tiāⁿ-luē-sòo, koh-ài sī 'nm' ê hāng-bo̍k sī siáⁿ-mih? Uì siáⁿ-iân-ē lâi kóng, che sī ū khó-lîng ê?
answer: 2010 koh 2009 nî ê piàn-tōa, 'credit reserve build ( release )' sī 'nm' (bô-ti̍t-tet). Che sī ū khó-lîng sī in-ūi 2009 nî ê sòo-jī sī chìn-sòo ($5799 pah-bān ê kiàn-siâⁿ), tān-sī 2010 nî ê sòo-jī chiâⁿ-chòe hù-sòo (-$1771 pah-bān ê kiat-pān). Tsò gîn-hâng pāi-pian ê sî, tùi chìn-sòo lâi piàn hù-sòo ê sî, che ê tiāⁿ-luē-sòo piàn-tōa sī bô-hoat-tō͘ kè-sǹg ê.

question: Gán-chiok siánn-choán ê chè-kim hē-sòan (financial metric) tī nn̄g-ê nî-chhoan-chhōa (year-over-year change) ê tiong-kan, hō͘-chòe sī 2008-2009 chi kan i ū chòe-sio̍k ia̍h-sī sió-sió-á tōa ê hō͘-sòan, tān-sī chiâⁿ chòe 2009-2010 chi kan ê tōa tōa-tōa ê hō͘-sòan?
2009 niá kàu 2008 niá, total operating expenses ê % cheng-hoà sī siáⁿ-chē?
